package.name: Standard Beams
package.description: A FreeCAD workbench to create standard beam profiles like I-Beams, L-Angles, Rectangular Tubes, Square Tubes, and Round Tubes.

workbench.name: Standard Beams
workbench.description: A FreeCAD workbench to create standard beam profiles like I-Beams, L-Angles, Rectangular Tubes, Square Tubes, and Round Tubes.
